thread.title: Roma legend Francesco Totti shows he's still got it with training ground stunner
thread.title_full: Roma legend Francesco Totti shows he's still got it with training ground stunner

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Roma legend Francesco Totti shows he's still got it with training ground stunner
text:
Sport Roma legend Francesco Totti shows he's still got it with training ground stunner The 40-year-old, who has made nearly 800 appearances at club level, is still going strong with the Giallorossi Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Francesco Totti scores a screamer in Roma training Share this video Get football   
He defies everything experts say about the game, he's one of the most loyal club players ever to have played football and he might just be our favourite player of all time. 
Francesco Totti is a hero. And somehow, at the age of 40, he's still going strong. 
The Roma legend is 22 games shy of reaching 800 appearances for the Serie A side and is still showing he can produce the goods. 
In a recent training session, Totti proved as much by scoring an absolute banger. Francesco Totti during an AS Roma training session (Photo: AS Roma via Getty Images) Totti connects cleanly with the ball (Photo: Twitter/AS Roma English) 
The Italian started the move carrying the ball from his own half before producing a clever reverse pass. 
Play then moves out to the left wing where a teammate delivers a deep cross. The ball finds Totti just inside the right of the box who swings at it first time connecting with it cleanly. Cool as a cucumber (Photo: Twitter/AS Roma English) 
The ball rockets off the bar, into the back of the keeper and into the back of the net. 
Totti, in typical cool fashion, walks off like an absolute boss. poll loading Is Francesco Totti the coolest footballer ever? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
